title: High-Contrast Sans from New York Magazine
content:
These are from the new issue of New York Magazine... any ideas?  
I think this font is really beautiful.  
Thx!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SANS_1_6052.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SANS_2_5466.jpg)
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content: Any help would be greatly appreciated!

This type of font can be made by cutting serifs on a Didot and making some other edits.  
Can't recall off hand if this one is a bespoke font for New York Magazine. If so, presumably it would have been made by legitimate means, i.e. from scratch or a scan of a printed Didot specimen rather than from an existing digital didot.  
Another sans serif Didot  
 [http://www.typographyserved.com/gallery/Sans-Serif-Didot/2135920](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.typographyserved.com/gallery/Sans-Serif-Didot/2135920 "http://www.typographyserved.com/gallery/Sans-Serif-Didot/2135920")  
Link to purchase it  
 [http://www.hellofont.com/vfonts/156](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.hellofont.com/vfonts/156 "http://www.hellofont.com/vfonts/156")  
An example of Didot snipping [http://dev.typophile.com/node/103636](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/dev.typophile.com/node/103636 "http://dev.typophile.com/node/103636")  
Another similar  
 [http://typophile.com/node/84062](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/typophile.com/node/84062 "http://typophile.com/node/84062")  
Don

Agree with Don. Most probably a bespoke typeface for New York Magazine but unfortunately, I wasn't able to find any information on it.  
Some alternatives you might like: [Simply Grotesk JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/simply-grotesk), [Stark Debonair](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/type/s/stark-debonair.html), [Vanitas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/vanitas), [Seaside](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/seaside), [Sang Bleu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.swisstypefaces.com/fonts/sangbleu), [Carisma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/carisma), [Contax Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeinnovations/contax-sans), [Patriciana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/green-type/patriciana), [Euro Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/euro-sans-pro), [Tenor Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404120327/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.behance.net/gallery/Tenor-Sans/3351597)
Thanks a lot for the suggestions and resources... some great options!
